title: Hours
text: We are open Monday through Saturday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM. The clinic is closed on Sundays.

title: Address
text: Precision Pain and Spine Institute is located at 12 Health Park, Hyderabad. Complimentary parking is available behind the building.

title: Services
text: We offer spine injections, comprehensive pain management plans, physiotherapy sessions, and follow-up consultations tailored to each patient.

title: Cancellation
text: Please cancel appointments at least 24 hours in advance by phone. Late cancellations may result in a fee.

title: Teleconsult
text: Teleconsultations with our specialists are available on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays. Book online or call us for scheduling details.
